definition: weighing relatively little compared with another item or object of similar use, a professional boxer who weighs between 131 and 135 pounds
details:
adjective
- weighing relatively little compared with another item or object of similar use
= example: weighing relatively little compared with another item or object of similar use
- having no importance or influence
= example: having no importance or influence
noun
- a professional boxer who weighs between 131 and 135 pounds
- a wrestler who weighs 139-154 pounds
- an amateur boxer who weighs no more than 132 pounds
- someone who is unimportant but cheeky and presumptuous
= synonyms: whippersnapper, jackanapes
